name: Flappy Joust
description:
Controls!

Q makes the green dude jump, comma makes the blue dude jump. You bounce off of walls and other dudes, but if you hit them coming from the side, one of you might go splat! It's like Joust or Glypha: the higher person wins. You also pick up speed when you jump or rebound.
